question_1.description: How many people are in the picture? Only output the number of people. If there are no people, output 0.

question_2.description: Give a subjective aesthetic score to the image. Only output the score number:

question_3.description: Tell me the number and gender of people in the image. The output is limited to 'N men', 'N women', 'N men and N women', 'no people' (where N represents a number)
